product_name: REI Rimrock Lined Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: Fully lined with soft polyester, the 32" REI Rimrock Lined pants will be your new go-to favorites for chilly days of travel, short hikes in the hills and afternoons at the cabin. Cotton is blended with nylon for a pleasing combination of softness and durability; soft polyester lining feels great next to skin. Pants include hand pockets, button-close rear pockets, a coin pocket and a side drop-in cell phone pocket. Gusseted crotch allows unrestricted range of motion. REI Rimrock Lined pants have a relaxed fit.
short_description: Fully lined with soft polyester, the 32" REI Rimrock Lined pants will be your new go-to favorites for chilly days of travel, short hikes in the hills and afternoons at the cabin.
